sentences.en: About a year later, Mr. Semple died. It was an untimely death.
sentences.cn: 大约一年之后, 珊波尔先生死了.这是意外的早逝.

sentences.en: Her untimely death at 25 made her parents heartbroken.
sentences.cn: 她25岁时英年早逝使她的父母非常伤心.

sentences.en: His illness led to his untimely death.
His mother's untimely death had a catastrophic effect on him.
sentences.cn: 他母亲的早逝给了他沉重的打击。

sentences.en: I am sure your readers would have seen the article as at best untimely.
sentences.cn: 即使往最好里说，我相信你的读者也会觉得这篇文章发表得不是时候。

sentences.en: I even saw in a brick passageway an untimely butterfly.
sentences.cn: 我甚至在一条砖砌小巷里看到了一只不合时令的蝴蝶.

sentences.en: If the words aren't there, people will and lament your untimely demise.
sentences.cn: 要是文章没了呢, 人们会悲叹你的不合时宜的消亡.

sentences.en: Lorenzo's untimely death has raised a new difficulty.
sentences.cn: 洛伦索的突然去世引起了新的困难.

sentences.en: She came to an untimely end , ie died young.
She met a tragic and untimely death at 25.
sentences.cn: 她于25岁时不幸猝然辞世。

sentences.en: The accident put an untimely end to the party.
sentences.cn: 事故使得聚会提前结束.

sentences.en: The accident put an untimely end to the trip.
sentences.cn: 这个意外让这个旅行早早就结束了.

sentences.en: The announcement brought the meeting to an untimely end.
sentences.cn: 这事的公布使会议早早地就结束了。

sentences.en: The end for Agnes Smedley came untimely and under difficult circumstances.
sentences.cn: 艾格妮丝·史沫特莱在艰难的环境下过早地结束了自己的一生.

sentences.en: the untimely death of a popular local man
sentences.cn: 一名当地红人的过早死亡

sentences.en: The untimely death of the engineer delayed the completion of the project.
sentences.cn: 工程师的过早去世推迟了工程的完工期.

sentences.en: Your 15 th untimely demand quite prize ascertain due what cause.
sentences.cn: 你方15日来电知悉,过早的需求使我方感到疑惑,请调查原因.

trans.tran_cn: 不适时的, 不合时宜的
不适时的，不合时宜的，过早的
trans.tran_en: happening too soon or sooner than you expected
